title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Teacher Training Program for Wiki-Based Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can build collaborative learning environments by utilizing basic functions of wiki platforms
Learners can design wiki-based activities structured in five stages (access-explore-engage-develop-integrate) according to blended learning strategies
Learners can promote trust and task distribution among learning groups by balancing individual and group assignments
Learners can evaluate and improve collaborative learning processes through wiki logs and page analysis
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
